summary: An ordinance relating to, and creating and establishing a fund to be known as the Utility Water Bonds and Warrants Interest and Redemption Fund, providing for the crediting of certain moneys thereto, and repealing Ordinance No. 30769, entitled: "An ordinance creating and establishing a fund to be known as the Water Bonds and Warrants Interest and Redemption Fund", approved February 5, 1913.
